entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as speaking to Xenophilius, expressing his opinion about helping Harry.

entities.name: xenophilius
entities.description: Xenophilius is mentioned as the one who keeps telling everyone it's their first duty to help Harry, and he has a printing press in his house.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being helped by Xenophilius.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as asking about Luna and suggesting they see what she thinks.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is mentioned as being down at the stream fishing for Freshwater Plimpies.

entities.name: freshwater plimpies
entities.description: Freshwater Plimpies are mentioned as the type of fish Luna is fishing for.

relationships.description: Xenophilius agrees to help Harry after being asked by Ron and Hermione.
